original_solution_mapping.L1: He is 6 inches too short this year because 54 - 48 = <<54-48=6>>6
original_solution_mapping.L2: He will naturally grow 4 inches taller because 12 x (1/3) = <<12*(1/3)=4>>4
original_solution_mapping.L3: He needs to grow 2 inches from hanging because 6 - 4 = <<6-4=2>>2
original_solution_mapping.L4: He needs to hang for 24 hours because 2 / (1/12) = <<2/(1/12)=24>>24
original_solution_mapping.L5: He needs to hang for 2 hours a month because 24 / 12 = <<24/12=2>>2

original_function_code:
def solve():
    """Index: 5174.
    Returns: the average number of hours Alex needs to hang upside down each month.
    """
    # L1
    required_height = 54 # 54 inches tall
    current_height = 48 # 48 inches tall this year
    height_shortfall_initial = required_height - current_height

    # L2
    natural_growth_per_month = Fraction(1, 3) # 1/3 of an inch per month
    months_per_year = 12 # WK
    natural_growth_per_year = months_per_year * natural_growth_per_month

    # L3
    height_needed_from_hanging = height_shortfall_initial - natural_growth_per_year

    # L4
    growth_per_hour_hanging = Fraction(1, 12) # 1/12 of an inch
    total_hanging_hours_needed = height_needed_from_hanging / growth_per_hour_hanging

    # L5
    hanging_hours_per_month = total_hanging_hours_needed / months_per_year

    # FA
    answer = hanging_hours_per_month
    return answer

logical_steps.solution_line_template: He is {height_shortfall_initial} inches too short this year because {required_height} - {current_height} = <<{required_height}-{current_height}={height_shortfall_initial}>>{height_shortfall_initial}

He will naturally grow {natural_growth_per_year} inches taller because {months_per_year} x ({natural_growth_per_month}) = <<{months_per_year}*({natural_growth_per_month})={natural_growth_per_year}>>{natural_growth_per_year}

He needs to grow {height_needed_from_hanging} inches from hanging because {height_shortfall_initial} - {natural_growth_per_year} = <<{height_shortfall_initial}-{natural_growth_per_year}={height_needed_from_hanging}>>{height_needed_from_hanging}

He needs to hang for {total_hanging_hours_needed} hours because {height_needed_from_hanging} / ({growth_per_hour_hanging}) = <<{height_needed_from_hanging}/({growth_per_hour_hanging})={total_hanging_hours_needed}>>{total_hanging_hours_needed}

He needs to hang for {hanging_hours_per_month} hours a month because {total_hanging_hours_needed} / {months_per_year} = <<{total_hanging_hours_needed}/{months_per_year}={hanging_hours_per_month}>>{hanging_hours_per_month}

flawed_nl_reconstruction.L2: He will naturally grow 4 inches taller because 12 x (1/3) = <<12*(1/3)=4>>4

explanation: Incorrect operand. The variable 'months_per_year' (value: 12) was used instead of 'height_shortfall_initial' (value: 6).
